TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableRowCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TableRowCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableRowCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type TableRowCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装表示 控件中单个行的 对象集合。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of objects that represent a single row in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类以编程方式管理一系列对象。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects. 此类通常用于添加或删除行从控件。This class is commonly used to add or remove rows from a control. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件包含集合，表示一系列对象。A control contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 每个表示表中的单个行，并包含集合，表示一系列对象。Each represents an individual row in the table and contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 这些对象表示表中的单个单元格。These objects represent the individual cells in the table. 若要获取的单个单元格，必须先获取从的集合控件。To get an individual cell, you must first get a from the collection of a control. 然后就可以获取从的集合。You can then get a from the collection of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式添加到表添加行对象，它为表示表中的行通过控制属性。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add rows to a table by adding objects, which represent the rows of the table, to the control through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-xml[Classic TableRowCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableRowCollection Example/Common/source.xml#1)]

span.span: Appends the objects from the specified array to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以追加到集合中指定的数组对象。Use the method to append the objects from the specified array to the collection. 构造一个表时，通常使用此方法。This method is commonly used when you are constructing a table. 若要构造一个表，请先创建一个数组对象来表示表的行。To construct a table, first create an array of objects to represent the rows of the table. 接下来，使用方法，传递数组作为参数，以添加到集合的对象。Next, use the method, passing the array as an argument, to add the objects to the collection.

span.span: A implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建实现可以循环访问轻松地获取每个项的对象。Use this method to create a implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the . 使用指向当前获取项的属性的集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法以将枚举数移回初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 必须在创建后调用方法实现对象或使用方法将枚举数移到集合中的第一项。The method must be called after creating a implemented object or using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，该项表示未定义属性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建实现循环访问表中显示的项的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a implemented object that is iterated through to display the items in the table. Sub Remove (o As Object) Implements IList.Remove

param.name: o
param.span: 要从集合中移除的对象。

span.span: The object to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除一个对象。

span.span: Removes an object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法移除元素对象。Typically, you should use the method to remove an element from a object. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
